info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 02 at 1:58PM MST until October 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 500 PM MST /500 PM PDT/. * At 158 PM MST /158 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in eastern Boulder City, particularly along the Gold Strike hiking trail. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Boulder City, Hoover Dam, Gold Strike Trail, Boulder Beach Campground and Boulder Beach. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
